title: There is logic to George Ford's recall... but what impact will move back to inside centre have on Owen Farrell's form?
text:
Change and change again. It is a mark of both managements that they keep on the move, keep probing, keep challenging, keep everyone on their toes.

The All Blacks have made a significant selection in the back row, promoting Scott Barrett to boost their lineout, and Eddie Jones has responded by reverting to the 10-12 double playmaker axis of George Ford and Owen Farrell that has served England so well down the years.

Jones would argue that it is just a different use of the 23-man squad. ‘Come and join the modern game’ was his invitation to the media last week when they insisted on describing Ford as being dropped for the quarter-final against Australia.

And now Ford starts. Is that a reflection...
